name: Reflections of the Past
description:
After a long and difficult adventure, you finally reach your destination: The Holy Cathedral of Purity.

In "Reflections of the Past" you will shift into the reflections to a parallel world that was seemingly left untouched by time. Though something seems to not be right...
Explore the holy cathedral and uncover its demonic secrets!



Reflections of the Past is a project made for Epic MegaJam 2022.

Game developers:
Pavel Tanonov
Patrick Spack
Alexander Hamparsomian
